<title level="1" right="Trait">[Low Gravity](/Traits.aspx?ID=281)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 252</row>

Planes with this trait have gravitational forces much weaker than those on the Material Plane.
name: Low Gravity
